thread.title: Decker Truck Line, Inc. Receives 2014 Nestle USA Supply Chain Outstanding Partner Award
thread.title_full: Decker Truck Line, Inc. Receives 2014 Nestle USA Supply Chain Outstanding Partner Award - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Decker Truck Line, Inc. Receives 2014 Nestle USA Supply Chain Outstanding Partner Award
text:
Decker Truck Line, Inc.
FORT DODGE, Iowa , Aug. 31, Decker Truck Line, Inc. was recently named the recipient of the 2014 Nestle USA Outstanding Partner Award.
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150828/262052LOGO
There are three freight centers for the Ice Cream/Pizza division and each center is granted the opportunity to hand select one carrier who has demonstrated excellent customer service in communication, reliability, friendliness, trustworthiness, and flexibility. The Outstanding Partner Award is given to a carrier who "Goes Above and Beyond" what is requested.
Decker was selected for this award based on five key areas that included: making an effort to communicate any issues that may arise on a daily basis, always willing to offer additional trucks to assist Nestle during high volume load season, making an effort to not over commit themselves that may result in performance failures, accommodating any load tender to any destination to help with any situation, and making an effort to schedule all loads accordingly and as promptly as possible.
Accepting the award on behalf of Decker Truck Line â€“ Western Division in Bakersfield, CA on July 28th was Jerrod Schmauch , Terminal Manager, Jenny Stuber , Director of Sales and Sandy Pope , Customer Service Representative.
Decker Truck Line, Inc., a family-owned business since 1931, is a diversified carrier with capabilities to transport flatbed freight, refrigerated freight and van freight to 48 states and 7 Canadian Provinces.
